page.title: 19EVENTS.
page.content: In a simple village setting, events which may seem old fashioned are still important. The village school invites older residents and parents to its Sports Day, Christmas Concert,Leavers Service and the School Sale. These occasions are very popular. The Methodist Church hold a Flower Show and Fete to which most villages will go. The Parish Church has a Festival each July with a concert, exhibition and special service. Hindringham Sports, once a large social occasion on Whit Monday, has been revived though it is now a village occasion and draws only a small crowd. The Village Players produce a Pantomime each year which is always well attended. The year is punctuated by these events and all sections of the community attend.
